about.description:
Dynamic time warping is used as a similarity measured between temporal sequences.
Not to be confused with dtw-python (https://dynamictimewarping.github.io/).
about.summary: Dynamic time warping is used as a similarity measured between temporal sequences

about.description:
Dynamic time warping is used as a similarity measured between temporal sequences.
Not to be confused with dtw-python (https://dynamictimewarping.github.io/).
about.summary: Dynamic time warping is used as a similarity measured between temporal sequences

name: dtw
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "dtw" %}
{% set version = "1.4.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6be2d561cbebede2550d877b32ea4b5c058dced6a846603d7881d214c29f88bc

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --ignore-installed
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.7
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.7
    - numpy
    - scipy

test:
  imports:
    - dtw

about:
  home: https://github.com/pollen-robotics/dtw/
  summary: 'Dynamic time warping is used as a similarity measured between temporal sequences'
  description: |
    Dynamic time warping is used as a similarity measured between temporal sequences.
    Not to be confused with dtw-python (https://dynamictimewarping.github.io/).
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bernt-matthias
